inclusion.criterion: New diagnosis of HIV or established in care in HIV clinic by stratified sampling
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of active TB or undergoing treatment for active or latent TB
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to produce sputum by coughing (e.g. recent rib fracture, chest pain, pneumothorax)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of steroids (equivalent to 15mg prednisolone for ≥4 weeks) or any other immunosuppressive drugs (e.g. azathioprine) - relative
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active solid organ or haematological malignancy (excluding Kaposi's sarcoma)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous hypersensitivity to purified protein derivative (PPD)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male with new diagnosis of TB, able to give informed consent. No active TB treatment or pregnancy.
